sheets.name: Database Info
sheets.query: SELECT SCHEMA_NAME as db_name, DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_NAME as charset, DEFAULT_COLLATION_NAME as collation FROM information_schema.SCHEMATA ORDER BY SCHEMA_NAME LIMIT 20

sheets.name: MySQL Version
sheets.query: SELECT @@version as version, @@version_comment as comment, NOW() as `current_time`

sheets.name: Table Statistics
sheets.query: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA as db_name, COUNT(*) as table_count, SUM(TABLE_ROWS) as total_rows FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA NOT IN ('information_schema', 'mysql', 'performance_schema', 'sys') GROUP BY TABLE_SCHEMA

sheets.name: MSSQL Test
sheets.query: SELECT TOP 5 name, database_id, create_date FROM sys.databases ORDER BY name
